Journal Story: We have been getting everything ready for our hike.  Finished teaching my last USAF/ARMY UH-60 Helicopter Maintenance class.  Just waiting for the date of retirement from Civil Service now.
Staying at our youngest daughters house. Enjoying our grandsons. Leaving truck and trailer here as we do our hike.
just need to do a final repack with a full food and water load. We are going to weigh the packs and take pictures with the grandsons. We leave for Georgia in the morning

Caught the bus in Elmira N.Y. going quick. Already through dc. Good t hing we packed food. Not a lot of time to find anything. Good weather so far. Its been fun dragging our backpacks through the terminals.

got to Gainesville Georgia around two pm today. We walked to O'Charlies restaurant. Just 3.5 miles each way. A good warm-up for tomorrow. Our shuttle will be here at 7 am tomorrow. We know it'll be tough. But we're gonna try it.
started our hike. We got 6 miles along the approach trail. We started to have aches and pains. The winds blowing 25 and greater. Put up the hiking tent. We are going to eat a cold dinner tonight
